The adamant battleaxe is a battleaxe that is stronger than a mithril battleaxe, but weaker than a rune battleaxe. As with all adamant weapons, an Attack level of at least 30 is required in order to wield it.

Players are able to obtain adamant battleaxes via trading with players, monster drops, or purchasing it at Brian's Battleaxe Bazaar (located in Port Sarim). It may also be a reward from a clue scroll. At level 80 Smithing, players can use 3 adamant bars to smith an adamant battleaxe, granting 187.5 experience.

[[File:Adamant battleaxe detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''adamant battleaxe''' is a [[battleaxe]] that is stronger than a [[mithril battleaxe]], but weaker than a [[rune battleaxe]]. As with all [[adamant weapons]], an [[Attack]] level of at least 30 is required in order to wield it.

Players are able to obtain adamant battleaxes via trading with players, monster drops, or purchasing it at [[Brian's Battleaxe Bazaar]] (located in [[Port Sarim]]). It may also be a reward from a [[clue scroll]]. At level 80 [[Smithing]], players can use 3 [[adamant bar]]s to smith an adamant battleaxe, granting 187.5 experience.
